customContent:
Double Your Donation This Christmas Season!

Giving Tuesday Match

Homelessness hurts. The despair and loneliness are overwhelming. Your gift today can give hope to people struggling in homelessness this Christmas.

Your $12 monthly gift provides a warm welcome, nutritious meal, a shower, clean clothes and a safe place to sleep - the first steps to a restored life through Portland Rescue Mission.

And your gift can be matched, up to $5,000, when you donate on Giving Tuesday!
